item.title: Introduction
item.description: Thw Owl client is used to interact with the Owl Server and submit jobs to the Kubernetes cluster. It can also be used to perform some admin tasks.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Install The Owl client requires Python 3.7 or higher. The latest stable version can be installed from PyPi: pip install owl-pipeline-client Authenticate to remote server Using your credentials owl login This will ask for your username and password. Credentials will be saved to a file in your home directory $HOME/.owlrc. Pipeline definition file List all available pipelines in the remote server using: owl pdef list If the server has been configured as per the instructions the example pipeline will be available.

item.title: Commands
item.description: Authentication # Authenticate in the remote server owl login Pipeline definitions # List available pipelines owl pdef list # Get pipeline definition for pipeline `example` owl pdef get example Job submission and management # Submit job owl submit pipeline.yml # Query status of Job ID 1 owl status get 1 # Get logs from Job ID 1 owl logs get 1 # Cancel Job ID 1 owl cancel 1
